```{r}
# reading input 
df<-read.csv("input/rare_sum.csv", header =TRUE, sep=",")
df <- df[complete.cases(df), ]  
df
```
```{r}
df <- subset(df, added_sum > 0)
df
```

```{r}
df$log_added_sum <- log(df$added_sum+1) 
cols <- c("log_added_sum")
df[cols] <- scale(df[cols])
df
```

```{r}
df$Group <- factor(df$Group)
```


```{r}
mod1 <- lmer(log_added_sum ~ Group + ( 1 | stage ) , data = df, REML = FALSE)
summary(mod1)
```

```{r}
library(multcomp)
summary(glht(mod1, linfct = mcp(Group = "Tukey")), test = adjusted("holm"))
```


```{r}
tableb <- aov(log_added_sum ~ Group , data = df)
summary(tableb)
```

```{r}
TukeyHSD(tableb, which = 'Group')
```
